subject: Maoris
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: When the All Blacks take the field Friday night in the opening match against Tonga, it will be the start of six weeks of an all-consuming passion for New Zealanders.
snippet: When the All Blacks take the field Friday night in the opening match against Tonga, it will be the start of six weeks of an all-consuming passion for New Zealanders.
